subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Riquana Williams scored 22 points and made two crucial free throws with 21.1 seconds left, as the host Tulsa Shock put a dent in the Liberty’s playoff hopes with a 93-88 victory.
snippet: Riquana Williams scored 22 points and made two crucial free throws with 21.1 seconds left, as the host Tulsa Shock put a dent in the Liberty’s playoff hopes with a 93-88 victory.
